item.description:
Enter park on Hurd Park Rd.  DO NOT PARK in the winter parking lot that is at the intersection - keep going down Hurd Park Rd. and take a right into the park.  Keep following the paved road until you see first dirt road on left, with a yellow gate in front. 

Don't drive down the trail but park up front along the side of the road.   Be careful not to block the entrance. 

This hike is pretty level (for the most part) until the end where it is totally uphill through rocky trail.  We will also make a stop at the CT River so the dogs can swim.

For more information, go to DEEP website: 

http://www.ct.gov/deep/cwp/view.asp?a=2716&q=325224&deepNav_GID=1650
item.how_to_find_us: Hurd Park Rd., Route 151, East Hampton, CT
item.name: Hurd Park/George Dudley Seymour State Park
